verbose_text: In addition to this inverse correlation, our work highlights the fact that the pH3S10 level could be used in association with the MGMT gene methylation status in order to stratify the GBM patients since 1) patients whose GBM had a high pH3S10 level and a unmethylated MGMT gene have a lower overall survival than patients whose GBM had a low pH3S10 level and a unmethylated MGMT gene and 2) patients whose GBM had a high pH3S10 level and a methylated MGMT gene have a lower overall survival than patients whose GBM had a low pH3S10 level and a methylated MGMT gene.
